nodes.documentation:
* @dev Ethereum payment channels allow for off-chain transactions with an on-chain
settlement. In this implementation, a party (member1) can open a channel with a 
deposit, expiration, and member2. The member1 can then sign transactions off-chain
and send them to the member2, who can submit one of these signed transactions to 
chain to close and settle the channel.
nodes.name: SimplePaymentChannel

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The address of the player is invalid"

arguments.value: The address of the player is invalid

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The length of the message is invalid"

arguments.value: The length of the message is invalid

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The length of the message is invalid"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You must use a valid address of one of the players"

arguments.value: You must use a valid address of one of the players

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You must use a valid address of one of the players"

nodes.name: closeChannel
isValidSignature

devdoc.details: Ethereum payment channels allow for off-chain transactions with an on-chain settlement. In this implementation, a party (member1) can open a channel with a  deposit, expiration, and member2. The member1 can then sign transactions off-chain and send them to the member2, who can submit one of these signed transactions to  chain to close and settle the channel.

closeChannel(uint256,uint256,bytes,addre.details: Close a channel with a signed message

params._balance1: uint256 The balance agreed to by the member1 in their signed message
params._balance2: uint256 The balance agreed to by the member2 in their signed message
params._signedMessage: bytes The signed hash of the balance

isValidSignature(uint256,uint256,bytes,a.details: Derive and verify member1 address from signed message and message hash

params._balance1: uint256 The balance agreed to by the member1 in their signed message
params._signedMessage: bytes The signed hash of the balance by the member1
